thread.title: Delayed South West Trains commuters are thanked for their "patience and understanding" | Meridian
thread.title_full: Delayed South West Trains commuters are thanked for their "patience and understanding" | Meridian - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Delayed South West Trains commuters are thanked for their "patience and understanding" | Meridian
text:
South West Trains @SW_Trains Follow Thank you for your patience and understanding, lines have now reopened. Apologies for the disruptions. Update: http://t.co/hhAhQnBTyo
08:35 - 2 Sep 2015 Retweet Reply Favourite Commuters hit by long delays on South West Trains services into London Waterloo this morning have been re-acting to a tweet thanking them for their patience.
Long delays are expected until lunchtime due to signalling problems between Wimbledon and London Waterloo.
Marc Rogers @mr_marc_rogers Follow @ sw_trains there's still no trains out of Waterloo and thousands waiting on concourse for news. Don't be tweeting like it's all fixed now!
07:47 - 2 Sep 2015 Retweet Reply Favourite Ben Summersby @Who_is_Benno Follow @ sw_trains Little tip for you SWT - SPEND SOME MONEY ON YOUR SIGNALS
07:47 - 2 Sep 2015 Retweet Reply Favourite Lorenzo Castellanos @castellanoslj Follow @ sw_trains patience? We don't have an option but to use your awful service, do we?
07:46 - 2 Sep 2015 Retweet Reply Favourite Jamie White @J_White94 Follow Well the fast train to waterloo isnt going very fast.. Its just sat there #delayed #signalling #southwesttrains http://t.co/r2ohWwID5g
08:26 - 2 Sep 2015 Retweet Reply Favourite Last updated Wed 2 Sep 2015 Read more 2 updates Commuter anger at rail delays into London Travel South West Trains London Waterloo Wimbledon
